title: BF-Fi
author: BF-Fi
created_time: April 26, 2023, 04:36:54 PMLast edit: June 08, 2023, 05:07:34 AM by BF-Fi
content: Jot Art's mission is to provide a mixed reality(XR) ecosystem powered by A.I with community and player-owned economies.The first game from Jot Art is the RPG Finesse game series. Finesse currently features 2 series; Shadow Warriors & The Kingdom. The Finesse series takes a Play-to-Earn (P2E) approach to reward players after battle wins.THE JOT TOKENJOT is a payment & governance token for the Jot Art metaverse. JOT holders will be able to claim rewards if they stake their tokens, pay for internal services in all Jot Art games, and participate in key governance votes. Players will also be able to earn ùìôOT when they play various games within the Jot Art metaverse and through user-generated content initiatives. JOT is on TRON (TRC20). ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬†  ¬† BOUNTY ALLOCATIONTelegram Campaign (10% of the Bounty Campaign)Twitter Campaign (25% of the Bounty Campaign)Article Campaign (15% of the Bounty Campaign)YouTube Campaign (15% of the Bounty Campaign)Signature Campaign (35% of the Bounty Campaign)Week 01 : 27 April - 03 MayWeek 02 : 04 May ¬†- 10 MayWeek 03 : 11 May ¬†- 17 MayWeek 04 : 18 May ¬†- 24 MayWeek 05 : 25 May ¬†- 31 MayThe Jot Art team is offering 2,000,000 JOT Tokens ($2M at today‚Äôs rate of $0.1 / 1 JOT), through this Bounty Program. This Bounty Campaign starts on the 28/04/2023 and finishes the 28/05/2023.Every single participant is required to submit their reports latest by closing of "FRIDAY" 23:59 UTC, if anyone crosses this deadline of report submission, his/her report will not be accepted or given rewards for it.The Week finishes on Sunday but Saturday and Sunday are kept for checking the results, so the final date of report submission would remain Friday only!Rules:‚úÖ You must follow the official twitter account: https://twitter.com/jotarts‚úÖ You must retweet and like at least 4 latest tweets ¬†and use hashtags #jotart #crypto #bitcoin #nft #blockchain #ethereum #DeFi (use all these tags in every post).‚úÖ You must tweet at least 2 of your original tweet about Jot Token per week and use hashtags #jotart #crypto #bitcoin #nft #blockchain #ethereum #DeFi‚úÖ Twitter accounts must be real and have at least 90% of real followers (twitter audit).‚úÖ Every week you need to submit the report on this bounty thread‚úÖ Once you submit your report on the thread, for week's onwards, you simply have to quote your own First week's report and add new week's report below it. And continue to follow this pattern every week.NOTE: Minimum (Total:4) 2 original posts and 2 shares must done with above mentioned Hashtags during the week before the report submitting deadline.Rewards:500-1500 Followers : 1 Stakes per week.1500-3000 Followers : 2 Stakes per week.3000-5000 Followers : 4 Stakes per week.5000 and above Followers : 6 Stakes per week.Reporting Format (must reply to thread)Code:Week: 1 (mm/dd/yyyy)-(mm/dd/yyyy)BitcoinTalk Name:Your Twitter Account Name:Your Twitter Profile Link:Links to the Original Tweets:1- :2- :Rules:‚úÖ You must post at least 3 of your original posts about Jot Token per week and use hashtags #jotart #crypto #bitcoin #nft #blockchain #ethereum #DeFi‚úÖ FB accounts must be real ‚úÖ Every week you need to submit the report on this bounty thread‚úÖ Once you submit your report on the thread, for week's onwards, you simply have to quote your own First week's report and add new week's report below it. And continue to follow this pattern every week.NOTE: Minimum ¬†3 original posts ¬†must done with above mentioned Hashtags during the week before the report submitting deadline.Rewards:100-1500 Followers/friends : 1 Stakes per week.1500-3000 Followers/friends : 2 Stakes per week.3000-5000 Followers/friends : 4 Stakes per week.5000 and above Followers/friends : 6 Stakes per week.Reporting Format (must reply to thread)Code:Week: 1 (mm/dd/yyyy)-(mm/dd/yyyy)BitcoinTalk Name:Your FB Profile Link:Links to the Original Tweets:1- :2- :[/url]Rules:‚úÖ All content will be judged by the criteria: quality, views and effects.‚úÖ Video must be at least 2 minutes, videos shorter are not accepted.‚úÖ Your channel should be at least 2 months old‚úÖ Your channel has at least 50 subscribers.‚úÖ You should make the video in English language or any other major languages.‚úÖ You will receive a reward at the end of the week, depending on the quality and popularity of your work.‚úÖ The video must be original. Copying graphics, text and other content are not allowed. (You can use official images, logos, images posted on websites, ANN-topic, Twitter and Facebook)Rewards:Low Quality : 2 stakesAverage Quality : 4 stakesHigh Quality : 6 stakes500+ Subscribers : 1 stakes1000+ Subscribers : 2 stakes5000+ Subscribers : 3 stakes20,000+ Subscribers : 6 stakesRules:‚úÖ Blogs and Sites eligible for this bounty campaign are:-Hackernoon-Steemit-blurg-Medium-Quora-Reddit‚úÖ The blog/article must be focused on the relevant topic. It must convey positively about our Project.‚úÖ Blog posts must have at least 100 words.‚úÖ Only original content will be accepted.‚úÖ Articles must be available till the end of this campaign. Removal/deletion of post prior to that will result in disqualification and no stakes.‚úÖ The article must have a link to our website, telegram channel.‚úÖ Please provide your Bitcointalk username at the end of the article so that the authenticity can be verified and easy to define stakes for you.Rewards:Low Quality : 2 stakesAverage Quality : 4 stakesHigh Quality : 6 stakes
